sentences.en: Foreign countries have a different way of life from ours.
sentences.cn: 外国的生活方式和我们的不同.

sentences.en: His agenda is discordant with ours.
sentences.cn: 他的日程安排和我们的有冲突。

sentences.en: His ideas were no longer in harmony with ours.
sentences.cn: 他同我们的想法不再一致了.

sentences.en: His stance towards the story is quite similar to ours.
sentences.cn: 他对该报道的态度和我们很相像。

sentences.en: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.cn: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.en: It is interesting to compare their situation and ours.
sentences.cn: 把他们的状况与我们的相比很有意思。

sentences.en: Let's clean their room first and then ours.
sentences.cn: 咱们先打扫他们的房间,再打扫我们的房间.
那辆蓝色的汽车超过我们的车子.

sentences.en: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.cn: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

sentences.en: Their aims are coincident with ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标与我们的一致。

sentences.en: Their house is in close proximity to ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子很接近我们的.

sentences.en: Their house is just across from ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子就在我们家的对面.

sentences.en: Their house is very similar to ours, but ours is bigger.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子和我们的十分相像，但我们的要大些。

sentences.en: Their instincts do not always run parallel with ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的本能并不总是和我们的相同。
他们的利益与我们的利益冲突.

sentences.en: They came to conclusions diametrically opposed to ours.
sentences.cn: 他们得出了与我们完全相反的结论。

sentences.en: You will need to arrange a telegraphic transfer from your bank to ours.
sentences.cn: 你们得安排由你方银行将钱款电汇给我方银行。

trans.tran_en: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with us
used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with us
